title: 11/04/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 11/04/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Colin makes NFL playoff predictions round by round

-Why is nobody talking about the Cowboys drafting Justin Fields?

-The media is blind to what Bill Belichick is doing

-Tom Brady will make sure things work out with Antonio Brown

-There are only four teams that can win the Super Bowl


Guests: Aqib Talib, Super Bowl Champion CB

Peter King, NBC Sports


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
